snippet: “Beneath the Harvest Sky” tells the story of two teenagers in a Maine town on the Canadian border, facing limited choices and desperate to find a way out.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews film Beneath the Harvest Sky, written and directed by Aron Gaudet and Gita Pullapilly.
lead_paragraph: “Beneath the Harvest Sky” tells the story of two teenagers in a Maine town on the Canadian border, facing limited choices and desperate to find a way out.

headline.print_headline: The Future Is So Dark, Pack a Lamp
headline.seo: ‘Beneath the Harvest Sky,’ a Drama of Northern Maine
headline.main: The Future Is So Dark, Pack a Lamp
